title: NAROA Natural Soft Honeycomb Sea Sponges for Shower in Gift Box (Large) Gentle Sea Loofah for Healthy Skin | Smooth Body Puff Relaxing Bathing Adults
features: IMPROVE YOUR SKIN - With a massaging feel, the honeycomb net like structure increases blood flow and softly removes dead skin cells to reveal a smooth to touch feel, and vibrant glow

HYGIENIC & CLEAN - Expertly clean your skin, individual fibres reach your pores, absorb excess oils and remove dirt to give you the cleanest feel after every bath. Sponges contain anti-bacterial /anti-fungal properties preventing mould and bacteria. A hygienic sponge, for cleaner skin

SUSTAINABLE & ECO FRIENDLY - Our sponges are hand cut when harvested, allowing them to grow back. Unlike others, we do not use dragnets that rip the sponges up, causing damage to the sea bed. Sustainable harvesting for maintaining the future environment

RELAXED & CHILL - Use the soft surface of the sponge to massage your body with light long smooth strokes and a rich lather. Unwind after work in a nice warm bath, scented candles, low lighting and truly destress the way you deserve, with naroa sponges

SOFT & GREAT GIFT - Naroa sea sponges are unbleached, handpicked with a natural brown colour, it maintains its fibres strength so that you can enjoy your sponge for longer. Treat yourself, family and friends to a natural shower sea sponge by naroa
description: Product Description Unbleached vs Bleached Natural Sponge Naroa natural sea sponges are unbleached, meaning they have not been processed using bleaching chemicals like others. Bleaching weakens the fibers causing the sponge to disintegrate quickly and have to be replaced more often. Unbleached sponges have stronger natural brown fibers and last longer. Natural vs Plastic Bathing Sponge Naroa bathing sponges are grown 100% natural sea waters. Plastic sponges leak harmful microplastics into the food chain and harbour bacteria which is bad for your skin. Choose naroa natural sponges to help reduce plastic waste, improve skin health so you can get skin that feels and looks its best!
